title: UCP Receipt
description: Agent-to-agent commerce message: a receipt confirming payment has been made, anchored to a Hedera Consensus Service sequence number for on-chain attestation. Validated with Ajv.

message_id.description: Globally unique identifier for this message.

job_id.description: Identifier of the job this receipt closes out.

buyer_agent_id.description: DID or account ID of the agent that made the payment.

seller_agent_id.description: DID or account ID of the agent that received the payment.

price.description: Amount paid in the specified currency token.

currency.description: Hedera Token Service token ID (e.g. '0.0.XXXXX') used for payment.

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of when this receipt was created.

canonical_hash.description: SHA-256 hex digest of the deterministic JSON-serialized message (excluding this field and signature).

signature.description: Agent signature over canonical_hash, proving authorship.

invoice_id.description: message_id of the Invoice this receipt settles.

payment_tx_id.description: Hedera transaction ID (e.g. '0.0.XXXXX@1234567890.123456789') confirming the token transfer.

payment_timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of when the on-chain payment was confirmed.

hcs_sequence_number.description: Hedera Consensus Service sequence number for the attestation message anchoring this receipt on-chain.
